meanings.sent1: The crab had forcepslike claws that it used to catch its prey.
meanings.sent2: The scissors had a forcepslike design, making them easy to grip.
meanings.sent3: The forcepslike handle on the teapot made it look like a tiny kitchen tool.
meanings.sent4: Her forcepslike fingers delicately picked up the fragile glass ornament.
meanings.sent5: The forcepslike branches of the tree reached out to grab anything passing by.
